TopicTitle: You can choose a super power however the next to respond chooses a side effect.

Articles.Content:
Side effect: Everyone now is testing your patience

Superpower: Existing

Side Effect: Existing in this world rather than a utopia.

Superpower: Having hours go by like they are minutes.

Side effect: you pass through time so fast that matthew McConaughey‘s character in interstellar appears stuck in a single second. 
 

superpower the powers of the Q continuum

035508012024

Side Effect: You are obsessed with Jean Luc Picard and follow him everywhere.

Superpower. Instant moustache.

Side effect: Every person and animal you look at instantly grows a luxurious moustache.

Superpower: Control people with any TV remote.

No need to corrupt this, 

corrupts it better than I could.

superpower: control over time itself (think Geras/Liu Kang on mk11/1)

110608012024

Side Effect: You can only do it if you don't move at all.

Super Power: The power to be Super.

You become superglue.

 

My superpower: to climb any boulder or climbing route that has ever been climbed before, including Silence, the epic 9C so far only accomplished by Adam Ondra.

Side effect: Have you thought about how you're gonna get down beforehand?

My superpower: Able to drive a car well (and not break any traffic laws)

Side Effect: You can only do this in Grand Theft Auto games.

My Superpower: I can adapt songs to what I need at any time.
